{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/title | at}}
{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
const_reference at( size_type pos ) const;
}}

Returns a reference to the entry at specified location {{tt|pos}}, with bounds checking. 

If {{tt|pos}} is not within the range of the stacktrace, an exception of type {{lc|std::out_of_range}} is thrown.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | pos | position of the stacktrace entry to return}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Reference to the requested entry.

===Exceptions===
{{lc|std::out_of_range}} if {{c|1=pos &gt;= size()}}.

===Complexity===
Constant.

{{example}}
